casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dexter Antonio HOWELL. No. 542P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of October 2006 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
